mapper.select: WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT HELPERCATE, COUNT(*) AS C FROM HELPER WHERE HELPERID != #{userid} GROUP BY HELPERCATE ) SELECT * FROM TEMP PIVOT (MAX(C) FOR HELPERCATE IN('청소해주기' AS CLEANINGNUM,'물건배달해주기' AS DELIVERYNUM,'쇼핑해주기' AS SHOPPINGNUM,'물건보관해주기' AS KEEPINGNUM,'줄서주기' AS LINEUPNUM,'돌봐주기' AS CARENUM,'역할대행해주기' AS COSPLAYNUM,'전문가비지니스' AS PROFESSIONALNUM,'물건옮겨주기' AS MOVINGNUM))
SELECT MONEY FROM USERS WHERE USERID = #{userid}

HELPERCATE LIKE #{searchcate} AND
